thread.title: Inside the home where 'abused' children rescued from parents 'who practised satanic rituals'
thread.title_full: Inside the home where 'abused' children rescued from parents 'who practised satanic rituals'

author: Natalie Evans
title: Inside the home where 'abused' children rescued from parents 'who practised satanic rituals'
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Five children have been taken into care by after their parents were found to be drugged and dancing around a home filled with satanic symbols. 
The youngsters, aged between three months and six years old, all showed signs of malnutrition and abuse . 
They were freed after cops swooped on the property in Santander, Colombia, following a tip-off from neighbours who were worried about screaming coming from the flat. 
Officers arrived to find the flat filled with smoke and, after breaking open the door, they reportedly found burnt offerings inside as well as the children. Read More A three-month-old baby was among the children rescued (Photo: CEN) Satanic messages were scrawled on the walls (Photo: CEN) 
The 49-year-old mother and her husband, who is an American citizen, were apparently under the effect of either the drugs or alcohol and were clearly agitated. There was also cannabis plants in the flat. 
As well as the burnt offerings police found lots of broken glass, dog excrement and the satanic symbols scrawled on the walls and doors. The home was filled with Satanist paraphernalia (Photo: CEN) There was evidence of rituals having been performed (Photo: CEN) 
There were also handwritten messages such as "US=enemies, 666" and "mundo de la mentira" (world of lies). 
The kids were transferred to a hospital where they are currently being treated for malnutrition, and being checked after showing signs of physical abuse. Read More There was also dog excrement and broken glass (Photo: CEN) 
The baby is said to be suffering from both dermatitis and conjunctivitis. 
The parents were arrested and transferred to the San Camilo psychiatric hospital where they are under medical surveillance. They were not named in reports. Like us on Facebook
